metadata.title: CVE-2019-20933 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
InfluxDB before 1.7.6 has an authentication bypass vulnerability in the authenticate function in services/httpd/handler.go because a JWT token may have an empty SharedSecret (aka shared secret).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

influxdb - 1.6.7~rc0-1
influxdb-client - 1.6.7~rc0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: influxdb package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.7~rc0-1').
